Author: nusantarageneral
Content:
### Day 1-3:

I have started the challenge by simply not taking a sh1t earlier, making it more difficult. Then I thought to myself;
> "I used to hold my crap for days when I was a child, maybe I still could manage to hold it off for a few days."

And so I thought, beginning from the evening of Day 2, I have started to face a few minor 'ngeden's as I have ate meal portions as large as your average Caseoh meal. Hope I can survive for the next few days...

___Signing off:___
